entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
